casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Christopher Dale RIDLEY. No. 272PA06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 28, 2007. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, Scott Thomas, District Attorney, for State of NC. John T. Hall, Raleigh, for Christopher Dale Ridley.

ORDER

The State's petition for discretionary review filed 18 May 2006 is allowed for the limited purpose of remanding the matter to the North Carolina Court of Appeals for reconsideration in light of State v. Blackwell, 361 N.C. 41 , 638 S.E.2d 452 (2006) and State v. Hurt, 361 N.C. 325 , 643 S.E.2d 915 (2007).

By order of the Court in Conference, this 27th day of June, 2007.
